comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Just wondering, why are people making so much noise about CBDC's, yet the same people use fiat currencies every day? Isn't it the same thing in this case, but it's just fiat in digital form, or I am missing some detail?Those who are smart will still choose Bitcoin over CBDCs if they want to make certain transactions like it is the case right now.

comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on October 26, 2022, 08:36:33 PMThose who are smart will still choose Bitcoin over CBDCs if they want to make certain transactions like it is the case right now.This nothing compared to Bitcoin because this is useless when it comes for the total control, you just simply migrating from fiat to digital, you still don't have full control of your money and you only giving the banks some options to make themselves superior again when it comes to our money. Bitcoin removed this kind of thing and if only people knows exactly how important bitcoins in today's era, Banks will no longer needed.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on October 26, 2022, 08:36:33 PMJust wondering, why are people making so much noise about CBDC's, yet the same people use fiat currencies every day? Isn't it the same thing in this case, but it's just fiat in digital form, or I am missing some detail?...Nope, yer not missing anything -they amount to exactly the same thing with the only difference being that if you chose, you can hold fiat in your hands and carry it in your pockets. When you are holding/moving funds through the banking systems, then there is ZERO difference.
